body.name: Calyptus Screen Cleaner Spray Kit | (2X) 4oz Sprayer Bottles + (4X) Microfiber Cleaning Cloth | Alcohol Free | Phone, Laptop, TV Screen, iPad, iPhone, MacBook Pro, Computer Monitor, Car Touch Screen
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 34 mins
features: GOOD-AS-NEW SHINE – EVERY TIME: Our obsessively engineered, best-in-class formula is the only streak-free digital screen cleaner that leaves your iPad, iPhone, Macbook, laptop, smart phone, computer screen, OLED TV screen, and even Meta Quest and other VR / AR smart glasses ridiculously clean and clear, totally safely, with no effort.

SPECIFICALLY ENGINEERED FOR SCREEN CLEANING: Stop using generic microfiber to clean your sensitive screens! Our extra-large (64 square-inch) Calyptus Pixel Shining and Buffing digital cleaning cloths perform flawlessly to safely restore your screens to a like-new shine effortlessly.

PRECISION PERFORMANCE FOR ALL ELECTRONIC DEVICES: Screen integrity + clarity = perfect, long-lasting performance. Protect and maximize performance of your most trusted digital screens. Highly optimized and best-in-class for use on all premium touch screens in any size.

GENTLE AND SAFE FOR ALL SCREENS: Our cutting-edge, best-in-class screen cleaning kit featuring our legendary screen cleaner spray offers our ultra-pure formula, free from alcohol, toxic chemicals, solvents, VOC's, and fragrances. Our fanatically made solution is highly effective and safe for all sensitive screen types, even those with multiple layered coatings.

JOIN THE CALYPTUS FAMILY – INTENT MATTERS: When you choose Calyptus, you're joining a growing community of millions who trust us to deliver intentional, innovative screen and lens cleaning solutions, that respect and harness the power of nature while preserving device integrity, for superior and safer cleaning performance.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 21,937 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS WORKS GREAT!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Windex electronic wipes but they have been getting dryer each time. I thought I would try a spray this time and this set's price was right and the reviews were great. A few sprays on the microfiber cloth removed all of the grime from my screen easily and with no streaks! It also has a polishing cloth to be used after the cleaning solution. You get 2 (4oz) bottles, 2 microfiber cloths and 2 polishing cloths. Highly recommended.EDIT: I just noticed that the 2 little bags that hold the cloths are resealable! So convenient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I doesnt smell bad like some of the stuff I ordered and returned.
reviews.reviewText: I have over 2000 DVDs & Blu ray discs. I cleaned all of them and this is the 3rd cleaner that I bought. The first cleaner I used was from Walmart that I bought probably 20 years ago when I got glasses. When it ran out I bought another cleaner and I like it but I thought I should try others. Some of the items I bought smelled so bad that I returned them after the first spray!This one doesn't smell. It works well on the discs and on my glassed, smart phone screen, laptop screen and TV screen. It doesn't leave streaks, either. The cleaning cloths are great, too. Wash them before use to get some of the color off that bleeds. I wash them every night if I use them just so they are clean when I need to use them again.I've made it through almost all of my 2000 discs as well as cleaning all the blu ray cases. I was appalled at the greasy residue that is on the cases, thinking that since most of them were used when I bought them that the prior owners messed them up. But I also found the same residue on brand new cases. So, I went through all my Blu Ray cases as well as some of the DVD cases and cleaned them. I have used 5 bottles of cleaners so far.This brand is my 4th brand that I kept, and it rates as well as the others did. The most recent prior to this brand was Purity lens cleaner. It is very good as well. I don't remember the cost comparison between them so when I need to reorder, I will look at cost, if both brands are available.If you look online, some places tell you not to use lens cleaner on blu ray discs, but I haven't found any problems with the discs after cleaning with lens cleaner. I won't pay the prices they are asking for blu ray disc cleaner, as it is sometimes 4 times the cost of lens cleaner. I haven't tried making my own cleaner, but I might if I ever have to clean my whole collection again. Now, I am very careful to only touch the outer edge and inside the middle circle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product works great!
reviews.reviewText: So far, I’ve used it on my phone screen and my computer screen- I’m super happy with the results. My screens are clean, shiny, and no fingerprints! The cloths that come with it are great too. It lasts too. I’m very happy with this product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this on my smart TV screens and my laptop computer. They both cleaned up very nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I got 2 bottles and 4 cloths with this purchase, I use an app called roadie, in this app they have orders where you pick up prescriptions for people and take it to them. It's a great app but the part that I don't like is sick people signing my phone with their finger (I've tried using stylus pens but it never seems to work right). This product works excellent, takes all the finger prints off plus knock on wood I haven't gotten ill in some time and as a bonus it takes off all the fingerprint marks and leaves my screen looking as new as when I first bought it! I'd recommend this to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great affordable product for your electronics
reviews.reviewText: I needed a screen cleaner for my laptop and as a college student I was very wary of what to use. I did not want to damage my screen so I saw this product and read the reviews and I saw it was super affordable. I just used this on my laptop and it works great I only needed a couple sprays and my screen was good as new. I would highly recommend for phone screens, Laptop and tv screens great and it comes with reusable wash cloths

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hadn't cleaned my tv for a while. And this cleaner got my kids fingers marks off without me having to press or scratch my tv. So I would definitely buy again and recommend it. It came with the wipe clothes so extra plus

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. Not streaky. Even works well on mirrors/glass. I highly recommend
